Location:
- Exterior balcony off living area; railing overlooks parking lot.

Observations:
- Metal vertical balusters with top and bottom rails; attached to concrete deck.
- Concrete/balcony surface shows light dirt; sliding glass door with screen; outdoor seating.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues (no dents, rust, gaps, water intrusion, or loose fasteners evident).

Recommendations:
- No repairs needed at this time.
- Routine maintenance: inspect railing fasteners for tightness during periodic upkeep; clean screen and deck, and recheck any sealant around door if staining appears.
